main event: A cigar-shaped object with a pointed nose was observed in Alpena, Michigan on 12 November 1957.
interesting points: The sound of the object was heard before it was seen, described as between a hiss and a low tone., The object flew at an altitude much lower than typical aircraft., The sighting lasted for about 10-15 seconds., There was speculation that the object could have been an aircraft viewed at such an angle that its wings and stabilizers were not visible., The reliability of the civilian witness who reported the sighting was noted as unknown.
sighted object: cigar-shaped object with a pointed nose
